alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 22 at 1:04AM CST until November 22 at 10:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28. * WHERE...Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County
